mapper.select: select ci.car_group_id from car_group_info ci left join car_group_serve_scope_info cgssi on cgssi.car_group_id=ci.car_group_id left join car_group_serve_org_relation s on ci.car_group_id=s.car_group_id where s.dept_id=#{deptId} and find_in_set(cgssi.city,#{cityCode}) and ci.company_id=#{companyId} and ci.state='Y000' and s.type='N100'

select ci.car_group_id from car_group_info ci left join car_group_serve_scope_info cgssi on cgssi.car_group_id=ci.car_group_id left join car_group_serve_org_relation s on ci.car_group_id=s.car_group_id where s.type='W200' and find_in_set(cgssi.city,#{cityCode}) and ci.company_id!=#{companyId} and ci.allow_outer_dispatch='Y000' and ci.state='Y000'
select s.user_id from car_group_info c left join car_group_dispatcher_info s on c.car_group_id=s.car_group_id where c.company_id=#{companyId} and c.state='Y000'

select s.car_group_id carGroupId, s.car_group_name carGroupName from car_group_info s left join car_group_serve_org_relation a on a.car_group_id=s.car_group_id where s.it_is_inner='C111' and a.dept_id=#{depeId} and s.state='Y000'
select it_is_inner from car_group_info where car_group_id in(select car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id=#{userId})

select car_group_id from car_info where car_id in (select car_id from order_info where order_id =#{orderId}) and car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id=#{userId})

select c.car_group_id carGroupId,c.car_group_name carGroupName ,c.telephone from car_group_info c left join car_group_serve_org_relation o on o.car_group_id = c.car_group_id where c.state =#{state} and c.it_is_inner =#{itIsInner} and o.dept_id =#{deptId}

select ci.car_group_id as carGroupId, cgsor.dept_id as deptId, cgsci.city, ci.it_is_inner itIsInner from car_group_info ci left join car_group_serve_org_relation cgsor on cgsor.car_group_id=ci.car_group_id left join car_group_serve_scope_info cgsci on cgsci.car_group_id=ci.car_group_id left join car_group_dispatcher_info cgdi on cgdi.car_group_id=ci.car_group_id where cgdi.user_id=#{userId} and ci.company_id=#{companyId}

select c.car_group_id carGroupId,c.car_group_name carGroupName from car_group_info c left join car_group_serve_org_relation o on o.car_group_id = c.car_group_id where c.state =#{state} and o.dept_id =#{deptId}
